name: bubble
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.platinum: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: A spray of countless bubbles is jetted at the foe. It may also lower the target’s Speed stat.
